synopsis.text: The anime follows Azmaria Hendrick, a young girl with a special power, in the early 1920s. Through flashbacks and narration, Azmaria provides background details on the characters, story, and world of the Chrno Crusade series. We learn about the Magdalene Order, an organization that fights against demons using weapons blessed by divine power. Azmaria describes the relationships between the main characters and key events that have shaped their lives. She also explains the state of society in this post-WWI era. Her short guides supplement the main storyline, helping viewers better understand the motivations and experiences of the characters. Azmaria acts as our insightful guide into the riveting adventures of the Chrno Crusade series. With her cheerful personality and wealth of knowledge, Azmaria endeavors to get viewers up to speed so they can fully appreciate the dramatic demon battles and emotional character arcs that await them.
